channel.title: What in the world are that german rs?
channel.description: when did rs suddenly go to german? and will there be more langs like swedish french danish???? and how to be a "beta" tester and get an invite?? and why is it so special? the only new is that all the letters n words or german now. uhm wtf??

item.title: What in the world are that german rs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“kmb, post:13, topic:63315”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=91548.msg973754#msg973754 date=1173080945]

no. You poeple are slow. You know how runescape is in english? and u can type in whatever u want? well rsG is the same, you can type in any language, but everything will be in german. updates nps ect…

Also, as far as I know you can swear in German on English runescape, and vice versa.
[/quote]
Weird, because you can’t swear in Finnish on English RS :. Well actually they have only blocked like one finnish swearword, but meh =p.[/quote]

It probably has something like fak or sxs in it. I’m not sure about English swearing on German runescape but it is possible to swear in German on English runescape.

Read full topic
item.source: What in the world are that german rs?

item.title: What in the world are that german rs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Find “Sprache > Englisch | Deutsch” on the page and click “Englisch”.

To become a beta tester, you probably need a German ip address.

The only thing different is German players get their own client that they can understand. I’m learning to speak German, so it’ll be funny to see what jagex has changed.

Read full topic
item.source: What in the world are that german rs?
